KeywordDescription: Check if content contains words from a user defined list of keywords (Maximum of 6 per guild).
KeywordPresetDescription: Check if content contains words from internal pre-defined wordsets (Maximum of 1 per guild).
MentionSpamDescription: Check if content contains more mentions than allowed (Maximum of 1 per guild).
SpamDescription: Check if content represents generic spam (Maximum of 1 per guild).
